staxel.collector.village.character.dialo: Hi! I don't think I've seen you before?
What's your name?
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
Are you another friend? I don't have any more riddles prepared...
But I think you will like where this takes you.
Just so you know... I will notice if you change anything in the cave.
So don't steal anything...
Hi?
I don't know you...
Why are you here? Are you going to take my stuff?
Stay away from my things.
Only my friends can come in here...
You do seem alright though... but we're not friends!
Or... Are we?
No! you need to prove yourself first!
If you can solve all my riddles, I'll let you see my lair.
So lets have some fun! Here's riddle number one...
I'm tall when I'm young but short when I'm old. What am I?
These riddles aren't easy, but not just anyone can be my friend!
Oh hey, you've actually found me.
You're doing better than I expected!
But if you really want to be my friend, you'll need to know a bit more about me.
It's important that we share the same tastes.
So lets see how you do, on riddle number two...
Of all the food here, which tastes the best?
I didn't expect you to make it!
Good to know you have excellent taste...
Because now you know what to bring for my birthday!
That is, if I invite you...
We don't truly know each other yet.
For that to be true, you have to get to know my other friends too!
So for riddle number three, this is my question to thee...
I've got many friends, they're all here! But only one steals the spotlight with cheer! Who is it?
Good!
You know my friends!
Now... I want my friends to always feel like they're at home.
So I have to make sure there are enough toilets for everyone!
You never know when one might break... that would be awkward!
I'm thinking of getting one more. Just in case!
So for riddle number four, you'll have to count the toilets on every floor...
If I get one more, how many would I have then?
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, what are you doing here?
I don't recall planning a sleepover...
Not that I mind!
Around here, it's always time for a sleepover.
You should come and find me in my game room. When it's sleepover time of course!
Do you like my farm?
It's pretty cool, isn't it?
We can build you a house around here if you want.
And maybe... We could visit each other from time to time!
... You seem like you have something you want to ask me?
Where did you get that hat?
Let's give Max his hat back.
Oh uh... I found it on the ground in my hallway.
I wanted to give it to that old man... but he didn't seem very friendly...
Figured I could just keep it, I think it fits me better anyway!
He's pretty stressed right now...
He's very friendly!
Oh... really?
I don't want to cause any trouble...
Could you give it to him for me? I'm not sure he wants to have me around...
Anyway, thanks for stopping by ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, You're actually pretty nice!
... Is there something else you want to say?
Your sister, Rem, is worried about you.
Your family wants you back home.
But I don't want to go back to the ^c:1486b0;Treetop Village^c:pop;! It's no fun there, I'd rather stay here.
At least here I can do some adventuring!
Come home with me and talk with them.
I'm not sure I want to do that...
I'm gonna spend some time outside my home...
Out of the cave, and on the surface. There are a lot of animals there, you know.
Feel free to look around here after I leave. Just don't steal my stuff...
Oh, and before you leave, come say goodbye to me.
I'll be hanging out on the surface!
Aren't you gonna give that hat back?
I don't want that guy to get angrier with me...
The man with the tall hat just ran past.
He was in a hurry, but he didn't seem too mad anymore!
I do still feel bad though...
Maybe I should come to your town after all... Maybe I can bring a gift or something...
You got enough toilet paper there? How about toilets?
Hmm... yes. I should at least go say sorry.
Oh, my family too... I hope they're not too upset?
I was just so bored at the ^c:1486b0;Treetop Village^c:pop;. It would be good to see them again too.
Thank you so much ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, let's play again some time soon!
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Hey, I have great news!
I'm coming to live here!
My family and I have been talking a lot, over these past few days.
^c:1486b0;Rem^c:pop; has finally agreed to let me come live here!
This place is a lot more interesting, and I already know you!
Even that ^c:1486b0;Mayor^c:pop; and I get along better now too... After I apologised for stealing his hat.
Also, ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; asked me to come help him in the shop once I'm moved in!
I guess I also have some items I should return to him first...
So what do you think ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, will you help me build my house?
Thanks ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I would gladly do it by myself! but I would be better off keeping my creativity to games...
Wouldn't want my house to collapse on me after all, haha.
You can also grab my toys and all that extra toilet paper from my island too!
Wow, it looks great! It's almost as good as I had imagined!
Now all I need to do is set my computer up...
Let's play together again soon!
Hey... ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
Do you know everyone in this town?
What am I saying... of course you do.
So uh, you know ^c:1486b0;Rosemary^c:pop;?
She seems very kind.
But I'm not sure how to approach her.
I was thinking... What if I could get her a new pet?
Maybe something for the ^c:1486b0;Pet Store^c:pop;.
Or maybe just for her...
You know... I think I saw this really cute ^c:1486b0;Fox^c:pop; on ^c:1486b0;Galaxy Island^c:pop;.
You don't know what the ^c:1486b0;Galaxy Island^c:pop; is? It's the island that we met on.
Maybe you could make friends with that ^c:1486b0;Fox^c:pop;... While I try to figure out what to say.
It had this ^c:d03e37;light brown fur^c:pop; with a dark tip at the tail, I'm sure you'll recognise it.
^c:1486b0;Foxes^c:pop; generally aren't picky with their food...
But I've heard that the ^c:d03e37;Moon Fish^c:pop; on that island are their favourite.
So please...  can you get that ^c:1486b0;Fox^c:pop; for me?
Yes! That's the one. I'll just take that it off you, thanks!
I know how to deal with ^c:1486b0;foxes^c:pop;.
Looks like it needs a little grooming... and a name...
I will take good care of it for now though.
I just need to talk with ^c:1486b0;Rosemary^c:pop;...
I can do this...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... Thank you for the help you've given me.
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
It didn't go well...
I brought ^c:1486b0;Cinnamon^c:pop; to ^c:1486b0;Rosemary^c:pop;, but it scared ^c:1486b0;Poopsy^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Hazel^c:pop;.
They ran off immediately and ^c:1486b0;Rosemary^c:pop; had to go find them...
I expected ^c:1486b0;Cinnamon^c:pop; to behave a little better.
Oh! Back on the island, I was playing the ^c:d03e37;Flute^c:pop; when I first approached the foxes.
They were calm then... and they were always nice to me after that.
Especially ^c:1486b0;Cinnamon^c:pop;...
I hope ^c:1486b0;Rosemary^c:pop; still wants to be my friend...
Where can we find this flute?
Can we make a new flute?
I'm not sure where I left the flute...
But I do remember how I made it!
If you could do this for me, I... I'll build you a mansion!
Not a real one of course...
Thanks for helping me out ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
We just need to get that flute...
The flute requires some ^c:d03e37;Purple Nettle^c:pop;.
I don't think I saw any growing on ^c:1486b0;Galaxy Island^c:pop; still, but I'm sure ^c:1486b0;Rem^c:pop; has some seeds in her store.
I'm nervous just thinking of how to make up with ^c:1486b0;Rosemary^c:pop;...
Amazing, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I will have to practice... but I think I can do it.
You're the best friend I've ever had, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Now to make up with Rosemary...
Maybe I should tell her about the other animals...
Hey ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, something interesting happened!
The other day I was building a house, and another person actually joined me!
In the game of course, I wasn't building around here...
I think his name is ^c:1486b0;Jamie^c:pop;?
He may be another friend! I just need to figure out who he is...
Actually, isn't there someone called ^c:1486b0;Jamie^c:pop; that lives here?
I think I saw him about the village... Playing games on his phone...
But I haven't spoken to him too much...
Anyway, I've actually been thinking, now that I have a real house...
I want to have a LAN party!
But... My house is suited for that at all!
Could I get you to make some improvements to my house?
You did such a good job building it! But it just needs a little extra!
^c:1486b0;Rem^c:pop; mentioned recently she found my old ^c:d03e37;Gaming Desktop^c:pop;.
Go see her when she's around with her shop, she might have it for sale.
I promise, it will be the last thing I ask of you!
Wow, you're the best!
Now we need to actually get prepared for the party...
Perfect! Maybe I should have asked for more cheesecake, this looks good.
I am so looking forward to this.
Thank you for everything, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
I couldn't be happier right now. None of my other friends are like you!
Actually... you know what would be fun?
If we became roomies!
Now that I've got two computers, we could play games together all the time!.
Well, even if you don’t want to, I'd love it if you at least come over every now and then.
I'll show you how to build the best house ever!
In that game of course...
See you around ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. Thank you!
All we need now is some food and drinks and it will be great!
Could you get us a ^c:d03e37;Cheesecake^c:pop;, 2 ^c:d03e37;Hot Cocoa^c:pop; and maybe 2 ^c:d03e37;Nettle Soup^c:pop;?
You might need to gather some ingredients from the ^c:1486b0;Galaxy Island^c:pop;
Could you also let ^c:1486b0;Jamie^c:pop; know for me?
I think he would enjoy this party...
What? Did I not tell you before about inviting him?
I thought I already told you...
Could you also let ^c:1486b0;Jamie^c:pop; know for me?
I think he would enjoy this party...
See you around, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, thanks again.
